main event: A UFO sighting was reported over Oceana, Virginia, involving one unidentified object observed for 60 seconds.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on February 2, 1954, at 2330Z., The source of the report was the military (Navy)., The observation was conducted through both ground visual and air visual means., The object was believed to be a meteor or shooting star by the observers., A second flight was ordered to photograph the area of observation due to the interest in the sighting.
